description.ko: 정보가 꽃잎으로 피어나고 빛이 기계에 생명을 불어넣는 디지털 정원.
description.en: A digital garden where information blooms into petals and light breathes life into the machine.

prompt: A 'Neural Willow Tree' whose hanging branches are made of glowing fiber-optic strands, interacting with a swarm of holographic, fractal butterflies. The petals on the ground are translucent binary-coded leaves in soft pastels (#89CFF0, #FFB6C1). Nature is shown reclaiming a derelict server room, with moss growing over metallic processors. Macro photography style, 8k, Unreal Engine 5. Subsurface scattering on the digital flora, soft bokeh background, and cinematic lighting that highlights the delicate, blooming textures of the forever-spring garden.
